BlackNightmare::

"It's your life Hellplague not mine"said sacastically the femme


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague/ Splattercannon/ Malice:
>  
> "Well no one asked you, now did they?" Hellplague said as she 
stepped in front of Malice and placed some small sensors on Malice's 
face, head and on various locations all over his body.  She turned 
to Necross and splattercannon and told them to pull him to his feet 
as she lessened the gravity holding him down.  The males obeyed and 
pulled Malice up roughly.  The bounty hunter leaned against 
Splattercannon as the sudden climbing to his feet made him a little 
light headed.  He stood up straight and tried to look behind him, 
because he couldn't see that mischevious Hellplague and that was 
cause for worry.  The Sweep commander shoo-ed away Necross and 
Splattercannon as she wrapped her arms around Malice's waist.   The 
males obeyed with hesitation, while Necross left the room entirely, 
Splattercannon took position by the door.  Malice looked at the arms 
around his waist and looked back at the femme biehind him.  It was 
at this time he actually noticed, she was kinda pretty.  She looked
>  like a Generation One Decepticon, only with no insignia.  But the 
though passed out of his mind as quickly as it entered.
> "'Scuse me, but I fel I must tell you something.  I'm taken.  A 
little Maxi down there is waiting on me."
> The Minion did not speak, but walked around in front of Malice, 
her arms still around his waist.  
> "Well she's down there, and I'm right here in front of you.  
Besides, I can offer you more than that Maximal-"
> "Maxitron actually," the hunter corrected,"it seems she was dumped 
here on accident while dealing with her universe's Unicron." he 
added with a grin.
> "Whatever.  It doesn't matter, my pet WILL come around and accept 
me.  Blacknightmare-" Hellplague said as she let go of Malice and 
shoved him back to the bed,"Make him 'comfortable'." she said with a 
seductive grin.
> "I need to ready some equipment then we can begin." 
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "YEa it's true"said the femme "But I didn't decided to have that 
> dangerous pet"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Splattercannon:
> >  
> > "You just worry about yourself.  I remember you having quite a 
bit 
> of trouble with the bounty hunter as I recall." he said as he 
> followed Necross.
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Blacknightmare::
> > 
> > "And you should better do it rightly"said sarcastically the 
> > femme"You know what will happen if you don't do it rightly"
> >

<bustercross365@y...> 
> > wrote:

> > > 
> > > Necross bows and turns to leave.  Splattercannon followed, and 
> > shortly arrived in Malic's holding area.  Malice was sitting up, 
> > unable to move.  Hellplague stood behind the bounty hunter 
> readying 
> > her equipment.
> > > "Unicron sent us to help you."  Necross said bluntly, 
> > Splattercannon remained silent.
> > >  
> > >  
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Unicron::
> > > 
> > > "Follow Helplague and help her to brain wash that bot, serious 
> > > injured go to heal... If that bot try something, I don't like 
> that 
> > > bot walking freely in my base... I will told you when will be 
> next 
> > > attack to MAximals"
